posts.post_content:
I am looking to fill a T207 set in lower grade condition. It does not necessarily have to be slabbed. I need approximately half of the set. I will post the list below. Thanks for looking and contact me, Steve, via email or at 570-897-7226.....P.S. I'm also seeking a O'hara T206 St. Louis in F-G. Thanks.
